list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Replace ThreeDLens component with LensEffect
Renamed the 'ThreeDLens' component to 'LensEffect' to better describe its functionality. Also optimized the 'LensEffect' by utilizing React's useRef hook for mouse move event handling. This should provide a more efficient and robust lens effect behavior.

MESSAGE.value:
Replace ThreeDLens component with LensEffect
Renamed the 'ThreeDLens' component to 'LensEffect' to better describe its functionality. Also optimized the 'LensEffect' by utilizing React's useRef hook for mouse move event handling. This should provide a more efficient and robust lens effect behavior.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Replace ThreeDLens component with LensEffect
Renamed the 'ThreeDLens' component to 'LensEffect' to better describe its functionality. Also optimized the 'LensEffect' by utilizing React's useRef hook for mouse move event handling. This should provide a more efficient and robust lens effect behavior.
